name: Aerospace and Defence Electronics
description: Companies that design, develop, and manufacture electronic systems, components, and subsystems for military aircraft, spacecraft, and defence platforms.

name: Armoured Vehicles and Tanks
description: Manufacturers of armoured fighting vehicles, tanks, and other protected mobility solutions for military and defence applications.

name: C4ISR (Command, Control, Communications, Computers, Intelligence, Surveillance, and Reconnaissance)
description: Providers of command and control systems, communications networks, and intelligence, surveillance, and reconnaissance solutions for military and defence operations.

name: Cybersecurity and Information Assurance
description: Companies that offer cybersecurity solutions, services, and consulting to protect government defence networks, systems, and data from cyber threats.

name: Defence Consulting and Strategy
description: Firms that provide strategic advisory services, management consulting, and operational expertise to government defence agencies and defence contractors.

name: Defence Logistics and Supply Chain Management
description: Companies that provide logistics, supply chain management, and maintenance services to support military operations and defence programmes.

name: Electronic Warfare and Signals Intelligence
description: Providers of electronic warfare systems, signals intelligence solutions, and electromagnetic spectrum operations capabilities for military and defence applications.

name: Missiles and Munitions
description: Manufacturers of missiles, rockets, and munitions for military and defence applications, including precision-guided munitions and ballistic missiles.

name: Naval Systems and Shipbuilding
description: Companies that design, build, and maintain naval vessels, submarines, and maritime systems for military and defence applications.

name: Radar and Sensor Systems
description: Providers of radar systems, sensor technologies, and surveillance solutions for military and defence applications, including air defence, ground surveillance, and maritime surveillance.

name: Space and Satellite Systems
description: Companies that design, develop, and operate space-based systems, satellites, and payloads for military and defence applications, including communications, navigation, and surveillance.

name: Training and Simulation
description: Providers of training and simulation solutions, services, and equipment for military and defence applications, including live, virtual, and constructive training environments.

name: Unmanned Systems and Robotics
description: Companies that design, develop, and manufacture unmanned aerial vehicles (UAVs), unmanned ground vehicles (UGVs), and robotics systems for military and defence applications.
